00018 INT8 EffectiveStrength( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00019 {
00020       INT8  bBandaged;
00021       INT32 iEffStrength;
00022 
00023       // Effective strength is:
00024       // 1/2 full strength
00025       // plus 1/2 strength scaled according to how hurt we are
00026   bBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
00027 
00028       // WANNE 2
00029       if (pSoldier->bStrength > 0)
00030       {
00031             iEffStrength = pSoldier->bStrength / 2;
00032             iEffStrength += (pSoldier->bStrength / 2) * (pSoldier->bLife + bBandaged / 2) / (pSoldier->bLifeMax);
00033       }
00034       else
00035       {
00036             iEffStrength = 0;
00037       }
00038 
00039       // ATE: Make sure at least 2...
00040       iEffStrength = __max( iEffStrength, 2 );
00041 
00042       return( (INT8) iEffStrength );
00043 }

00046 INT8 EffectiveWisdom( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00047 {
00048       INT32 iEffWisdom;
00049 
00050       iEffWisdom = pSoldier->bWisdom;
00051 
00052       iEffWisdom = EffectStatForBeingDrunk( pSoldier, iEffWisdom );
00053 
00054       return( (INT8) iEffWisdom );
00055 }

00057 INT8 EffectiveAgility( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00058 {
00059       INT32 iEffAgility;
00060 
00061       iEffAgility = pSoldier->bAgility;
00062 
00063       iEffAgility = EffectStatForBeingDrunk( pSoldier, iEffAgility );
00064 
00065       if ( pSoldier->sWeightCarriedAtTurnStart > 100 )
00066       {
00067             iEffAgility = (iEffAgility * 100) / pSoldier->sWeightCarriedAtTurnStart;
00068       }
00069 
00070       return( (INT8) iEffAgility );
00071 }

00109 INT8 EffectiveLeadership( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00110 {
00111       INT32 iEffLeadership;
00112       INT8  bDrunkLevel;
00113 
00114       iEffLeadership = pSoldier->bLeadership;
00115 
00116       // if we are drunk, effect leader ship in a +ve way...
00117       bDrunkLevel = GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier );
00118 
00119       if ( bDrunkLevel == FEELING_GOOD )
00120       {
00121             iEffLeadership = ( iEffLeadership * 120 / 100 );
00122       }
00123 
00124       return( (INT8) iEffLeadership );
00125 }
00126 
00127 INT8 EffectiveExpLevel( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00128 {
00129       INT32 iEffExpLevel;
00130       INT8  bDrunkLevel;
00131       INT32 iExpModifier[] = 
00132             { 0,  // SOBER
00133                   0,    // Feeling good
00134             -1,   // Borderline
00135             -2,   // Drunk
00136              0,         // Hung
00137             };
00138 
00139       iEffExpLevel = pSoldier->bExpLevel;
00140 
00141       bDrunkLevel = GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier );
00142 
00143       iEffExpLevel = iEffExpLevel + iExpModifier[ bDrunkLevel ];
00144 
00145       if (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
00146       {
00147             if ( (gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait == CLAUSTROPHOBIC) && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && gbWorldSectorZ > 0)
00148             {
00149                   // claustrophobic!
00150                   iEffExpLevel--;
00151             }
00152       }
00153 
00154       if (iEffExpLevel < 1)
00155       {
00156             // can't go below 1
00157             return( 1 );
00158       }
00159       else
00160       {
00161             return( (INT8) iEffExpLevel );
00162       }
00163 }

00189 UINT8 GetPenaltyForFatigue( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00190 {
00191       UINT8 ubPercentPenalty;
00192 
00193       if                ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >= 85 )      ubPercentPenalty =   0;
00194       else if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >= 70 )    ubPercentPenalty =  10;
00195       else if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >= 50 )    ubPercentPenalty =  25;
00196       else if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >= 30 )    ubPercentPenalty =  50;
00197       else if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >= 15 )    ubPercentPenalty =  75;
00198       else if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >   0 )    ubPercentPenalty =  90;
00199       else                                                                                                        ubPercentPenalty = 100;
00200 
00201       return( ubPercentPenalty );
00202 }
00203 
00204 void ReducePointsForFatigue( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 *pusPoints )
00205 {
00206       *pusPoints -= (*pusPoints * GetPenaltyForFatigue( pSoldier )) / 100;
00207 }
00208 
00209 INT32 GetSkillCheckPenaltyForFatigue( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iSkill )
00210 {
00211       // use only half the full effect of fatigue for skill checks
00212       return( ( (iSkill * GetPenaltyForFatigue( pSoldier ) ) / 100) / 2 );
00213 }
00214 
00215 INT32 SkillCheck( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bReason, INT8 bChanceMod )
00216 {
00217       INT32 iSkill;
00218       INT32 iChance, iReportChance;
00219       INT32 iRoll, iMadeItBy;
00220       INT8  bSlot;
00221       INT32 iLoop;
00222       SOLDIERTYPE * pTeamSoldier;
00223       INT8  bBuddyIndex;
00224   BOOLEAN fForceDamnSound = FALSE;
00225 
00226       iReportChance = -1;
00227 
00228       switch (bReason)
00229       {
00230             case LOCKPICKING_CHECK:
00231             case ELECTRONIC_LOCKPICKING_CHECK:
00232 
00233       fForceDamnSound = TRUE;
00234 
00235                   iSkill = EffectiveMechanical( pSoldier );
00236                   if (iSkill == 0)
00237                   {
00238                         break;
00239                   }
00240                   // adjust skill based on wisdom (knowledge) 
00241                   iSkill = iSkill * (EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) + 100) / 200;
00242                   // and dexterity (clumsy?)
00243                   iSkill = iSkill * (EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) + 100) / 200;
00244                   // factor in experience
00245                   iSkill = iSkill + EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) * 3;
00246                   if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, LOCKPICKING ) )
00247                   {
00248                         // if we specialize in picking locks...
00249                         iSkill += gbSkillTraitBonus[LOCKPICKING] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, LOCKPICKING );
00250                   }
00251                   if (bReason == ELECTRONIC_LOCKPICKING_CHECK && !(HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, ELECTRONICS)) )
00252                   {
00253                         // if we are unfamiliar with electronics...
00254                         iSkill /= 2;
00255                   }
00256                   // adjust chance based on status of kit
00257                   bSlot = FindLocksmithKit( pSoldier );
00258                   if (bSlot == NO_SLOT)
00259                   {
00260                         // this should never happen, but might as well check...
00261                         iSkill = 0;
00262                   }
00263                   iSkill = iSkill * pSoldier->inv[bSlot].bStatus[0] / 100;
00264                   break;
00265             case ATTACHING_DETONATOR_CHECK:
00266             case ATTACHING_REMOTE_DETONATOR_CHECK:
00267                   iSkill = EffectiveExplosive( pSoldier );              
00268                   if (iSkill == 0)
00269                   {
00270                         break;
00271                   }
00272                   iSkill = (iSkill * 3 + EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) ) / 4;
00273                   if ( bReason == ATTACHING_REMOTE_DETONATOR_CHECK && !(HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, ELECTRONICS )) )
00274                   {
00275                         iSkill /= 2;
00276                   }
00277                   break;
00278             case PLANTING_BOMB_CHECK:
00279             case PLANTING_REMOTE_BOMB_CHECK:
00280                   iSkill = EffectiveExplosive( pSoldier ) * 7;
00281                   iSkill += EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) * 2;
00282                   iSkill += EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) * 10;
00283                   iSkill = iSkill / 10; // bring the value down to a percentage
00284 
00285                   if ( bReason == PLANTING_REMOTE_BOMB_CHECK && !(HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, ELECTRONICS)) )
00286                   {
00287                         // deduct only a bit...
00288                         iSkill = (iSkill * 3) / 4;
00289                   }
00290 
00291                   // Ok, this is really damn easy, so skew the values...
00292                   // e.g. if calculated skill is 84, skewed up to 96
00293                   // 51 to 84
00294                   // 22 stays as is
00295                   iSkill = (iSkill + 100 * (iSkill / 25) ) / (iSkill / 25 + 1);
00296                   break;
00297 
00298             case DISARM_TRAP_CHECK:
00299 
00300       fForceDamnSound = TRUE;
00301 
00302                   iSkill = EffectiveExplosive( pSoldier ) * 7;
00303                   if ( iSkill == 0 )
00304                   {
00305                         break;
00306                   }
00307                   iSkill += EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) * 2;
00308                   iSkill += EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) * 10;
00309                   iSkill = iSkill / 10; // bring the value down to a percentage
00310                   // penalty based on poor wisdom
00311                   iSkill -= (100 - EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) ) / 5;
00312                   break;
00313 
00314             case DISARM_ELECTRONIC_TRAP_CHECK:
00315 
00316       fForceDamnSound = TRUE;
00317 
00318                   iSkill = __max( EffectiveMechanical( pSoldier ) , EffectiveExplosive( pSoldier ) ) * 7;
00319                   if ( iSkill == 0 )
00320                   {
00321                         break;
00322                   }
00323                   iSkill += EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) * 2;
00324                   iSkill += EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) * 10;
00325                   iSkill = iSkill / 10; // bring the value down to a percentage
00326                   // penalty based on poor wisdom
00327                   iSkill -= (100 - EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) ) / 5;
00328 
00329                   if ( !(HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, ELECTRONICS )) )
00330                   {
00331                         iSkill = (iSkill * 3) / 4;
00332                   }
00333                   break;
00334 
00335             case OPEN_WITH_CROWBAR:
00336                   // Add for crowbar...
00337                   iSkill = EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) + 20;
00338       fForceDamnSound = TRUE;
00339                   break;
00340 
00341             case SMASH_DOOR_CHECK:
00342                   iSkill = EffectiveStrength( pSoldier );
00343                   break;
00344             case UNJAM_GUN_CHECK:
00345                   iSkill = 30 + EffectiveMechanical( pSoldier ) / 2;
00346                   break;
00347             case NOTICE_DART_CHECK:
00348                   // only a max of ~20% chance
00349                   iSkill = EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) / 10 + EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier );
00350                   break;
00351             case LIE_TO_QUEEN_CHECK:
00352                   // competitive check vs the queen's wisdom and leadership... poor guy!
00353                   iSkill = 50 * ( EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) + EffectiveLeadership( pSoldier ) ) / ( gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].bWisdom + gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].bLeadership );
00354                   break;
00355             case ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ITEM_CHECK:
00356             case ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ELECTRONIC_ITEM_CHECK:
00357                   iSkill = EffectiveMechanical( pSoldier );
00358                   if (iSkill == 0)
00359                   {
00360                         break;
00361                   }
00362                   // adjust skill based on wisdom (knowledge) 
00363                   iSkill = iSkill * (EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) + 100) / 200;
00364                   // and dexterity (clumsy?)
00365                   iSkill = iSkill * (EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) + 100) / 200;
00366                   // factor in experience
00367                   iSkill = iSkill + EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) * 3;
00368                   if (bReason == ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ELECTRONIC_ITEM_CHECK && !(HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, ELECTRONICS)) )
00369                   {
00370                         // if we are unfamiliar with electronics...
00371                         iSkill /= 2;
00372                   }
00373                   break;
00374             default:
00375                   iSkill = 0;
00376                   break;
00377       }
00378 
00379       iSkill -= GetSkillCheckPenaltyForFatigue( pSoldier, iSkill );
00380 
00381       iChance = iSkill + bChanceMod;
00382 
00383       switch (bReason)
00384       {
00385             case LOCKPICKING_CHECK:
00386             case ELECTRONIC_LOCKPICKING_CHECK:
00387             case DISARM_TRAP_CHECK:
00388             case DISARM_ELECTRONIC_TRAP_CHECK:
00389             case OPEN_WITH_CROWBAR:
00390             case SMASH_DOOR_CHECK:
00391             case ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ITEM_CHECK:
00392             case ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ELECTRONIC_ITEM_CHECK:
00393                   // for lockpicking and smashing locks, if the chance isn't reasonable
00394                   // we set it to 0 so they can never get through the door if they aren't
00395                   // good enough
00396                   if (iChance < 30)
00397                   {
00398                         iChance = 0;
00399                         break;
00400                   }
00401                   // else fall through
00402             default:
00403                   iChance += GetMoraleModifier( pSoldier );
00404                   break;
00405       }
00406 
00407       if (iChance > 99)
00408       {
00409             iChance = 99;
00410       }
00411       else if (iChance < 0)
00412       {
00413             iChance = 0;
00414       }
00415 
00416       iRoll = PreRandom( 100 );
00417       iMadeItBy = iChance - iRoll;
00418       if (iMadeItBy < 0)
00419       {
00420             if ( (pSoldier->bLastSkillCheck == bReason) && (pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sSkillCheckGridNo) )
00421             {
00422                   pSoldier->ubSkillCheckAttempts++;
00423                   if (pSoldier->ubSkillCheckAttempts > 2)
00424                   {
00425                         if (iChance == 0)
00426                         {
00427                               // do we realize that we just can't do this?
00428                               if ( (100 - (pSoldier->ubSkillCheckAttempts - 2) * 20) < EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) )
00429                               {
00430                                     // say "I can't do this" quote
00431                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_DEFINITE_CANT_DO );
00432                                     return( iMadeItBy );
00433                               }
00434                         }
00435                   }
00436             }
00437             else
00438             {
00439                   pSoldier->bLastSkillCheck = bReason;
00440                   pSoldier->ubSkillCheckAttempts = 1;
00441                   pSoldier->sSkillCheckGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
00442             }
00443 
00444             if ( fForceDamnSound || Random( 100 ) < 40 )
00445             {
00446                   switch( bReason )
00447                   {
00448                         case UNJAM_GUN_CHECK:
00449                         case NOTICE_DART_CHECK:
00450                         case LIE_TO_QUEEN_CHECK:
00451                               // silent check
00452                               break;
00453                         default:
00454                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
00455                               break;
00456                   }
00457             }
00458 
00459       }
00460       else 
00461       {
00462             // A buddy might make a positive comment based on our success;
00463             // Increase the chance for people with higher skill and for more difficult tasks
00464             iChance = 15 + iSkill / 20 + (-bChanceMod) / 20;
00465             if (iRoll < iChance)
00466             {
00467                   // If a buddy of this merc is standing around nearby, they'll make a positive comment.
00468                   iLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; 
00469                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ iLoop ]; iLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; iLoop++,pTeamSoldier++ )
00470                   {
00471                         if ( OK_INSECTOR_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) )
00472                         {                       
00473                               bBuddyIndex = WhichBuddy( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile );
00474                               if (bBuddyIndex >= 0 && SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTeamSoldier->sGridNo ) < 15)
00475                               {
00476                                     switch( bBuddyIndex )
00477                                     {
00478                                           case 0:
00479                                                 // buddy #1 did something good!
00480                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_BUDDY_1_GOOD );
00481                                                 break;
00482                                           case 1:
00483                                                 // buddy #2 did something good!
00484                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier,  QUOTE_BUDDY_2_GOOD );
00485                                                 break;
00486                                           case 2:
00487                                                 // learn to like buddy did something good!
00488                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_LEARNED_TO_LIKE_WITNESSED );
00489                                                 break;
00490                                           default:
00491                                                 break;
00492                                     }
00493                               }
00494                         }
00495                   }
00496             }     
00497       }
00498       return( iMadeItBy );
00499 }

00501 
00502 INT8 CalcTrapDetectLevel( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, BOOLEAN fExamining )
00503 {
00504       // return the level of trap which the guy is able to detect
00505 
00506       INT8 bDetectLevel;
00507 
00508       // formula: 1 pt for every exp_level
00509       //     plus 1 pt for every 40 explosives
00510       //     less 1 pt for every 20 wisdom MISSING
00511 
00512       bDetectLevel = EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier );
00513       bDetectLevel += (EffectiveExplosive( pSoldier ) / 40);
00514       bDetectLevel -= ((100 - EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) ) / 20);
00515 
00516       // if the examining flag is true, this isn't just a casual glance
00517       // and the merc should have a higher chance
00518       if (fExamining)
00519       {
00520             bDetectLevel += (INT8) PreRandom(bDetectLevel / 3 + 2);
00521       }
00522       
00523       // if substantially bleeding, or still in serious shock, randomly lower value
00524       if ((pSoldier->bBleeding > 20) || (pSoldier->bShock > 1))
00525       {
00526             bDetectLevel -= (INT8) PreRandom(3);
00527       }
00528 
00529       if (bDetectLevel < 1)
00530       {
00531             bDetectLevel = 1;
00532       }
00533 
00534       return( bDetectLevel );
00535 }
